lead_paragraph: TSURUOKA--Rabbi Theodore. Temple Am Echad of Lynbrook mourns the passing of our past president and extends our sympathy to his bereaved family. Lisa Burch, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TSURUOKA, RABBI THEODORE
